    public class TextTextTextAdjacencyListVertexInputFormat
extends org.apache.giraph.io.formats.AdjacencyListTextVertexInputFormat<org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,org.apache.hadoop.io.Text>
    Class to read graphs stored as adjacency lists with ids represented by Strings and values as doubles. This is a good inputformat for reading graphs where the id types do not matter and can be stashed in a String.
